entries.title: Coalition ‘Thinks Big’ in New South Wales Land Tax Reform
entries.description: NSW Premier Dominic Perrottet arrives at the Jobs and Skills Summit at Parliament House in Canberra, Australia on September 1, 2022  . (Photo by Martin Ollman/Getty Images)

entries.title: New Online Portal Released for Sexual Assault Survivors in Australian State
entries.description: In Australia, more women than men have reported being exposed to physical or sexual violence from an intimate partner. (Idanupong/Adobe Stock)

entries.title: Alberta Premier Clarifies Comments Made About COVID-19 Prosecutions
entries.description: Alberta Premier Danielle Smith speaks at a press conference after members of her cabinet were sworn in, in Edmonton on Oct. 24, 2022. (Jason Franson/The Canadian Press)

entries.title: ‘Masterclass of Hypocrisy,’ Private Jet Use at Davos Attracts Severe Criticism Due to High Emissions
entries.description: Founder and executive chairman of the World Economic Forum Klaus Schwab delivers remarks at the Congress centre during the World Economic Forum (WEF) annual meeting in Davos on May 23, 2022. (Fabrice Coffrini/AFP via Getty Images)

entries.title: Some Republicans Are Set to Attend the Elite Swiss Globalist WEF Conference
entries.description: A sign of the World Economic Forum (WEF) is seen at the Congress centre during its annual meeting in Davos on May 23, 2022. (Fabrice Coffrini/AFP via Getty Images)

entries.title: Public Transit Struggling to Lure Back Riders Amid Deficits, Rising Costs of Living
entries.description: Commuters wait to take the subway at Ossington Station in Toronto on June 22, 2018. (The Canadian Press/Tijana Martin)

entries.title: Mass to Be Held Near Site of Quebec Propane Explosion as Three Remain Missing
entries.description: Police and fire officials block off a road as police say at least one worker is missing after an explosion at a propane facility in St-Roch-de-l'Achigan, Que. Jan.12, 2023. (The Canadian Press/Ryan Remiorz)

entries.title: Top Democrat Rebuffs Biden’s Potential F-16 Sale to Turkey
entries.description: Sen. Bob Menendez (D-N.J.) speaks during a hearing in Washington on July 25, 2018. (Samira Bouaou/The Epoch Times)

entries.title: Plane Crash Leaves at Least 68 Dead in Nepal: Officials
entries.description: Rescue teams work to retrieve bodies at the crash site of an aircraft carrying 72 people in Pokhara in western Nepal on Jan. 15, 2023. (Bijay Neupane/Handout via Reuters)

entries.title: Labor Puts $70 Million Towards New Hydrogen Hub in Australia’s Queensland
entries.description: Hydrogen storage tank concept. (magann/Adobe Stock)

entries.title: Thousands in Israel Hold Protest Against Government’s Plans to Reform Judicial System
entries.description: Israelis protest against the government and its proposed judicial reforms to reduce powers of the Supreme Court in a main square in Tel Aviv, Israel, on Jan. 14, 2023. (Ronen Zvulun/Reuters)

entries.title: Thousands of Free Meals for Students in Australian State of Victoria
entries.description: Prep students enjoy returning to the classroom at Lysterfield Primary School on October 12, 2020 in Melbourne, Australia. (Photo by Daniel Pockett/Getty Images)

entries.title: Australian State of Queensland to Fast-Track Oil Refinery Upgrade
entries.description: Queensland is set to upgrade two remaining oil refineries. (Marek Piwnicki/Unsplah)

entries.title: Australian Government Urged to ‘Step Up’ on Vaping
entries.description: Vaping has reached record levels in Britain, according to a new report (PA)

entries.title: Study Estimates 900 Million in China Infected With COVID, Officials Admit 60,000 Deaths in Past Month
entries.description: Mourners gather outside memorial halls for the deceased at a funeral home in Shanghai, China, on Dec. 31, 2022. (Qilai Shen/Bloomberg via Getty Images)

entries.title: Iran Sentences Belgian Aid Worker to Prison, Lashes
entries.description: This is a locator map for Iran with its capital, Tehran. (AP Photo)

entries.title: Ukraine Official Says Zelenskyy Hopes to Visit UN on Invasion Anniversary
entries.description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky speaks during a press conference in the western Ukrainian city of Lviv, on Jan. 11, 2023. (Yuriy Dyachyshyn/AFP via Getty Images)

entries.title: Ranj Pillai Officially Sworn in as Yukon’s 10th Premier
entries.description: Yukon Deputy Premier Ranj Pillai takes questions from the media as Alberta deputy premier Sarah Hoffman looks on at the Western Premiers' Conference in Yellowknife, N.T., May 23, 2018. (The Canadian Press/Pat Kane)

entries.title: Russia Sets New Contingency Plan for Crew of Damaged Space Capsule
entries.description: A stream of particles, which NASA says appears to be liquid and possibly coolant, sprays out of the Soyuz spacecraft on the International Space Station, forcing a delay of a routine planned spacewalk by two Russian cosmonauts, in this still image taken from video on Dec. 14, 2022. (NASA TV/Handout via Reuters)

entries.title: Quebec Man Recounts Rescue Attempt in Propane Explosion That Left Workers Missing
entries.description: Police and fire officials block off a road as municipal officials say workers are missing after an explosion at a propane facility in St-Roch-de-l'Achigan, Que., north of Montreal on Jan.12, 2023. (The Canadian Press/Ryan Remiorz)

entries.title: North Macedonia: 4 Officers Arrested Over Convict’s Escape
entries.description: (Google Maps/Screenshot via The Epoch Times)

entries.title: Xi ‘Lying Flat’ and Losing Out? No Way!–Even Purged Opponents Rally Around Him as the West Gets It Wrong Again
entries.description: Chinese leader Xi Jinping speaks at the podium during the meeting between members of the standing committee of the Political Bureau of the 20th CCP Central Committee and Chinese and foreign journalists in Beijing on Oct. 23, 2022. (Lintao Zhang/Getty Images)

entries.title: Old Nazi Map Sparks Treasure Hunt in the Netherlands
entries.description: A a street in the Dutch village of Ommeren, Netherlands, on Jan. 6, 2023. (Piroschka van de Wouw/Reuters)

entries.title: Ukraine Forces Retain Control of Soledar Despite Russian Claims, Governor Says
entries.description: A tank fires a round, amid Russia's attack on Ukraine, in Soledar, Donetsk region, Ukraine, in this screen grab released on Jan. 8, 2023.(State Border Guard Service Of Ukraine/via Reuters)

entries.title: Iran Sentences Former President’s Daughter to a 5-Year Prison Term
entries.description: Faezeh Rafsanjani, daughter of former Iranian president Akbar Hashemi Rafsanjani, speaks to a journalist as she attends a reformist campaign for upcoming parliamentary election, in Tehran, Iran, on Feb. 18, 2016. (Raheb Homavandi/Reuters)

entries.title: Cardinal George Pell on Final Journey Home to Australia
entries.description: Catholic Archbishop of Sydney Anthony Fisher conducts a Solemn Pontifical Requiem mass to pay homage to Cardinal George Pell at St Mary’s Cathedral in Sydney, Australia, on Jan. 12, 2023. (AAP Image/Dean Lewins)
